[[inst_bstart_mpar]]
==== BSTART.MPAR

*Syntax:* BSTART.MPAR <VS8, VS16>

*Description:* Block Start: marks the beginning of a template block with execution hint.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_bstart_mpar.svg[BSTART.MPAR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* CMD/BLOCK_SPLIT
